title: True Sisters
description: Ruby has had a lot of foster siblings over the years, but none of them have been anything like Clara. After growing up in almost complete isolation, Clara is distraught at being separated from her mother and overwhelmed by life in a world she doesnâ€™t understand. But the more Ruby tries to help Clara fit in, the more she realises she has to face up to some struggles of her own.
author: Keren David
